name: Sitro
description:
Context

this game was made by two students for an IIM(Institut de l'Internet et du Multimédia) school game jam.

we only had a few days to make a Game on lime. So we invented a game with Sitro as the main character

Story

Sitro belongs to a very special species, it is a lively lime with an extraordinarily good taste. He is the last of his kind since humans love them and he is trying to escape from one of them. Despite of all the obstacles he can encounter, he always manages to escape and survive but he can't live like that! So he decides to fight against this human who won't let him go!

Controls

Controls for playing the game are very simple. The player will have to move with the Q and D keys (azerty keyboard). The player can also jump with the space bar and interact with objects with the E key. And later in the adventure you will discover that there will be another key which is the left click of the mouse.

Team

Pierre Arvis - Programmer

Damien Leclercq - Game Designer
